description:
Who else wants to make money writing and get more book sales?

Writing a great book is just the first step. Now you have to get people to actually buy your book!

In this course, you'll learn how to make a consistent, ongoing income from book sales -- whether you're selling physical books, ebooks or audiobooks.

Use the latest tools and step-by-step marketing techniques to take control of your book marketing!

If you've faced REAL problems trying to market your book successfully, this course is for you.

Unfortunately, over 90% of all Self-Published Authors don't earn enough money to make a living off of their book sales. This is because most authors don't know how to market their books effectively.

I'm a self publisher who has made a consistent six-figure income from selling my titles. I've studied how the masters do it, and now I'm going to share my secrets with you.

Discover The Secrets of Millionaire Self-publishers, including:

•Jack Canfield - a high school teacher in Chicago, who couldn't get a publisher. His book "Chicken Soup for the Soul" brand has earned over $2 billion in sales!

•J.K. Rowling - author of Harry Potter, with over 450 million book sales, making her the 2nd richest woman in England, right after the Queen!

•E.L. James - writer of 50 Shades of Grey. As the highest paid author in 2013, she was paid over $100 million and her book has been turned into a major Hollywood movie!

Here's what you'll learn:
•How to make money on your book sales
•Secret techniques previously known only to millionaire authors and successful book marketers
•Learn how to go from new author to bestseller on Amazon Kindle
•Use my inner game system to improve your mindset and increase your success
•How to become the authority in your own life so you can become an authority to others
•Learn how to protect your book ideas
•Save money (over $100) on getting a US Copyright
•Learn how to write an irresistible press release
•Examples of successful press releases and why they are successful
•Find your target audience
•Learn about your connectors and how can they help you reach your target audience
•Learn how to get an instant audience
•Prioritize your marketing and learn my new "star system" technique for who you should contact first
•Discover professional tips on how to get your target's email address
•Learn how to get your book into the hands of your target audience
•Get the Bestseller Secrets used to promote "50 Shades of Grey", which you can use to increase your own book sales.
•Discover the Bestseller Secrets of Altucher's "Choose Yourself", which sold over $250,000 worth of books!
•Learn the millionaire book marketing secrets from Jack Canfield's hit "Chicken Soup for the Soul" series.
•Learn how to get your book on the National Bestseller lists, like the Wall Street Journal and USA Today!
•How to get your book on the NY Times Bestseller List!
•Learn how to become an Amazon Bestseller!
•Get the Top 5 Strategies to make a living as an author.
•And much more!!

Get started today so you can sell more books!

Make extra money as a writer and enjoy those extra dollars in monthly income!

Risk-free 30 Day Money-Back guarantee. If you are not completely delighted, you can get a full refund!

Thanks for joining the course and best of luck with your books!
title: Become a Bestselling Author on Kindle and Sell More Books
